languages.text: Существо атакует своими омерзительными когтями, нанося {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивая{/g} цель. Также этот удар может {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуть{/g} цель на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

This creature attacks with its hideous claws, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushing{/g} the target back. This blow can also knock the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: Существо атакует своими омерзительными когтями, нанося {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивая{/g} цель. Также этот удар может {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуть{/g} цель на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

traits.locale_text: This creature attacks with its hideous claws, dealing damage and pushing the target back. This blow can also knock the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

This creature attacks with its hideous claws, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushing{/g} the target back. This blow can also knock the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

This creature attacks with its hideous claws, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushing{/g} the target back. This blow can also knock the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: この生物はひどく醜い爪で攻撃し、{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与え、対象を{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}押しのける{/g}。その一撃は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}間、ターゲットを{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}に倒すこともできる。
languages.original_text: This creature attacks with its hideous claws, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushing{/g} the target back. This blow can also knock the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この生物はひどく醜い爪で攻撃し、ダメージを与え、対象を押しのける。その一撃は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、ターゲットを{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}状態にすることもできる。

languages.text: 此生物用恐怖的利爪攻击敌人，造成{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，并将目标{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}。怪力猛推也可能会使目标陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
languages.original_text: This creature attacks with its hideous claws, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushing{/g} the target back. This blow can also knock the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 此生物用恐怖的利爪攻击敌人，造成伤害，并将目标推开。怪力猛推也可能会使目标陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}俯卧{/g}状态，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Esta criatura ataca con garras espantosas, infligiendo {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empujando{/g} al objetivo. Este golpe también puede {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribar{/g} al objetivo durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature attacks with its hideous claws, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushing{/g} the target back. This blow can also knock the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Esta criatura ataca con garras espantosas, infligiendo daño y empujando al objetivo. Este golpe también puede {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribar{/g} al objetivo durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: Diese Kreatur greift mit ihren grässlichen Klauen an, verursacht dabei {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}stößt{/g} das Ziel weg. Dieser Schlag kann beim Ziel außerdem 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt{/g} verursachen.
languages.original_text: This creature attacks with its hideous claws, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushing{/g} the target back. This blow can also knock the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kreatur greift mit ihren grässlichen Klauen an und verursacht dabei Schaden und stößt das Ziel weg. Dieser Schlag kann beim Ziel außerdem 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Hingestreckt{/g} verursachen.

languages.text: Les attaques menées par cette créature à l'aide de ses horribles griffes infligent des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} à la cible et la {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repoussent{/g}. Ce coup peut également {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}paralyser{/g} la cible pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature attacks with its hideous claws, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushing{/g} the target back. This blow can also knock the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les attaques menées par cette créature à l'aide de ses horribles griffes infligent des dégâts à la cible et la repoussent. Ce coup peut également {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}paralyser{/g} la cible pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Bu yaratık, korkunç pençeleriyle saldırarak {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir ve hedefi geriye doğru {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}iter{/g}. Ayrıca bu darbe, hedefi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntluğuna{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}yere devirebilir{/g}.
languages.original_text: This creature attacks with its hideous claws, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushing{/g} the target back. This blow can also knock the target {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g} for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
